greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions p of n into distinct parts including mean(p).
mathematica: z = 70; f[n_] := f[n] = Select[IntegerPartitions[n], Max[Length /@ Split@#] == 1 &];
Table[Count[f[n], p_ /; MemberQ[p, Mean[p]]], {n, 0, z}]   (* A240850 *)
Table[Count[f[n], p_ /; ! MemberQ[p, Mean[p]]], {n, 0, z}] (* A240851 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 14 2014
